Camarillo.Camarillo station: Camarillo is a passenger rail station in the city of Camarillo, California. It is served by both Amtrak's Pacific Surfliner from San Luis Obispo to San Diego and Metrolink's Ventura County Line from Los Angeles Union Station to east Ventura. Amtrak's San Diegan trains (later renamed the Pacific Surfliner) began stopping in Camarillo at the end of June 1995.
